topic.name: Human Anatomy
topic.description: Fundamentals of the musculoskeletal and organ systems.

questions.text: Which muscle is primarily responsible for elbow flexion?
questions.explanation: The biceps brachii flexes the forearm at the elbow joint.

questions.text: How many chambers does the human heart contain?
questions.explanation: The heart has two atria and two ventricles, totaling four chambers.

questions.text: The cerebellum primarily coordinates which body function?
questions.explanation: The cerebellum integrates sensory input to fine-tune balance and movement.
